resources.string: Dantion is a fast response application that can detect robbers and accidents through voice recordings.

When there is a robbery, press your motorcycle horn and adjust it to the horn sound pattern that we have provided. If the horn pattern matches, the application will send a notification of the thief along with the location of the incident to the nearest authorities.
When a collision sound is detected and also a collision between motorbikes or cars, the application will send an accident notification along with its location to all nearby application users.
